creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
text:
The getLastModified() method returns the last modification time of a meta data
block. This method is per meta data block to allow a fine-grained control of
last modifications. That's useful when part of the document necessary for
document rendering is stored in meta data (like title, etc). With the last
modification date it's possible to cache the meta data. It will get more useful
when it comes to JCR properties where properties might change rapidly.

creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
text:
Created attachment 16854
Patch for a getLastModified() method for meta data.
